awards.achievement: Awarded 'Green Innovator of the Year' by Eco Warrior Digest.
GreenRoof™ installations have increased urban green spaces by 150% in cities like Seattle and Austin.
Partnered with UNICEF to implement PureStream Filters™ in areas suffering from water scarcity.
TerraCharge™ pathways have been adopted by 20 major city parks globally, reducing their carbon footprint.
